I am a PhD student at the University of Waterloo in the Department of Pure Mathematics. I was at the mathematics department of the University of Warwick before moving here. Damiano Testa supervised my undergraduate project; David McKinnon is supervising my PhD. Here (PDF, 200KB) is a copy of my CV.

I am particularly curious about the possible Galois actions on the Picard group of a variety.

I didnâ€™t expect that optimizing for exposition would have such a profound impact on my depth of understanding of my own research.
